data.comment: The big names in today's match at De Oude Meerdijk have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Serdar Gozubuyuk, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 20, Davy Klaassen scores to make it 0-1 at De Oude Meerdijk.
Great play from Lassina Franck Traore to set up the goal.
Zakaria Labyad puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 29, That's a fine assist from Davy Klaassen.
Goal! Ajax extend their lead to 0-3 through Lassina Franck Traore.
Antony Santos instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at De Oude Meerdijk.
Serdar Gozubuyuk has blown to start the second-half.
Dick Lukkien is making the team's first substitution at De Oude Meerdijk with Donis Avdijaj replacing Anco Jansen.
In the minute 46, Klaas-Jan Huntelaar is replacing Lassina Franck Traore for the away team.
Quincy Promes is on a sub for Dusan Tadic for Ajax.
Erik ten Hag (Ajax) is making a third substitution, with David Neres replacing Antony Santos.
In the minute 58, The away team replace Ryan Gravenberch with Jurgen Ekkelenkamp.
Goal! Jurgen Ekkelenkamp extends Ajax's lead to 0-4.
Ajax make their fifth substitution with Devyne Rensch replacing Noussair Mazraoui.
In the minute 75, Marko Kolar is replacing Nikolai Laursen for Emmen at De Oude Meerdijk.
Emmen make their third substitution with Hilal Ben Moussa replacing Michael Chacon.
Sean Klaiber (Ajax) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 82, Goal! Quincy Promes extends Ajax's lead to 0-5.
That's a fine assist from David Neres.
That's full-time at De Oude Meerdijk. The final score is 0-5.
